title: when will the full screen problem fix?
body: its taking way toooo long and i've already got a time ban just by it

replies.body: The [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) tracker on the full screen issue is gone, and may be resolved at this point.  If this is still an issue, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further.  We'll reply back asap!

well it kind of works..i guess its just that i cant play fullscreen so for example its basically minimized into a tiny square that i can still see my desktop with icons on the side so its still not working i can play but.. its annoying playing in a tiny square and i cant even zoom back into full screen, i cant even press the button which makes it go to full screen

I'm on a 2016 macbook. I haven't bee able to play for a week because of the same issue. After champion select I am in a black screen that never loads into game even though I can hear game sounds. The game continues to freeze every couple of seconds. One thing I don't see other people mention is that it seems to freeze on the first frame that I joined. (e.g. when i join i am standing in base. I start walking down lane. After a few seconds it snaps back to showing my character in base and is frozen) When I tab out and back in i see my character correctly standing under tower where I had originally directed him. Freezing pattern begins a few seconds later and repeat :(

I see that the full screen announcement is gone in the client but nothing has been fixed for me either.
it is still not working. pls do somethink.
